biotools.summary: Predict regulatory binding sites based on conservation across multiple species. The user provides an ungapped multiple sequence alignment representing the regulatory binding site. It reports back with predicted binding sites that are conserved and highlights the downstream co-regulated genes.

bioschemas.name: iCR
